title: Email Security Is Stuck in the Antivirus Era: Why It Needs a Modern Approach
description: Picture this: you’ve hardened every laptop in your fleet with real‑time telemetry, rapid isolation, and automated rollback. But the corporate mailbox—the front door for most attackers—is still guarded by what is effectively a 1990s-era filter. This isn't a balanced approach.
